BR_text.BRdescription: This value was set in the 6.0 release. It's missing in the 6.1 and 6.2 releases.

comments_0.comment_text:
HI <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TobyRoseman>@TobyRoseman</denchmark-link>
   I would like to solve the issue. Can you assign it to me.

comments_1.comment_text:
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pradeek232662>@pradeek232662</denchmark-link>
 . I have assigned the issue to you.
 I just noticed that tc.version_info.build_number is also not getting set.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/ea8873d6fa597d4a9f9a26db3c8e4540eba7efbd/scripts/make_wheel.sh#L360>Here is where the git_sha should be getting set</denchmark-link>
 . A <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/ea8873d6fa597d4a9f9a26db3c8e4540eba7efbd/scripts/make_wheel.sh#L354>couple of lines above that</denchmark-link>
  is where the build number should be getting set.
 I strongly suspect both problems where introduced when we moved to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/psf/black>black</denchmark-link>
  style formatting. I think the fix here will be very similar to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/pull/3077>#3077</denchmark-link>
 .
